data.title: Demi Lovato Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Demi Lovato on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Demi Lovato including Camp Rock, Princess Protection Program, and more.
data.text:
Shiny Happy People

All reassess their personal lives after witnessing a chance reunion between two long-lost lovers in the emergency room; Karev treats a troubled teen; Meredith shares her suspicions with Cristina.

First Down

Bellick shacks up with Michael, Lincoln and Nika in hopes of discovering Westmorelandâs hidden $5 million; a family learns the dangers of hitchhiking when they pick up a stranded T-Bag; Abruzzi rejoins the family and is determined to get his revenge on Fibonnoci; Kellerman makes his move on Sara, who gets a phone call she has been waiting for; and Mahone finally gets his man.

A Katy or a Gaga

The members of New Directions tackle their assignment of getting out of their comfort zones and determining whether theyâre more like âKatyâ (Perry) or (Lady) âGaga.â Kurt holds auditions for his new band and must decide if heâll let in the overly bold performer, Starchild. Meanwhile, Jake gets closer to Bree as he and Marley grow apart. Musical performances include "Marry The Night", "Applause", "Wide Awake", and "Roar".
